name: Univar Solutions Inc.
description: Univar Solutions Inc. is a global chemical and ingredient distributor that provides a wide range of products and solutions to a diverse customer base. Founded in 1924, the company has established itself as a leader in the distribution of specialty chemicals, serving industries such as food, personal care, pharmaceuticals, and industrial manufacturing. Univar Solutions prides itself on its extensive portfolio, which includes thousands of products from leading manufacturers, alongside its value-added services such as formulation, logistics, and regulatory support. The company's mission is to help customers innovate and grow while ensuring safety, sustainability, and compliance with industry regulations. With a strong commitment to environmental stewardship, Univar Solutions actively promotes sustainable practices across its supply chain and works to minimize its ecological footprint. The company operates in North America, Europe, Asia, and Latin America, leveraging its global reach to provide localized solutions tailored to market needs. Univar Solutions continues to invest in technology and digital solutions to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the chemical distribution industry.
